translation.ko: 최고의 신랑 들러리가 꼭 해야 할 일은 신랑을 식장에 들여보내는 거죠

translation.en: No one ever said anything about him being on time or being late,
translation.ko: 신랑이 결혼식에 늦건 아니건 뭐라는 사람은 없잖아요

translation.en: but the most important thing is that he made it.
translation.ko: 신랑이 결혼식에 늦건 아니건 뭐라는 사람은 없잖아요 중요한 건 식장에 들어갔느냐예요

translation.en: -Didn't you make it? -Barely.
My dad was livid. The vicar almost sent us back.
translation.ko: 아빠 얼굴이 창백했어요 목사님한테 쫓겨날 뻔했다고요

translation.en: When are you two gonna need a best man?
Uh... I don't know about that.
I think we should just allow these ladies bond a bit.
Ah, no that's an escape strategy! No!
Don't you ladies need to compare notes on wedding outfits or something?
translation.ko: 신부 들러리들도 의상 같은 거 상의해야 하지 않아요?

translation.en: Oh, so because we're women, automatically, we would have to talk about wedding outfits?
translation.ko: 우린 여자니까 무조건 옷 얘기나 하라는 거예요?

translation.en: We have a feminist here. Isaac, grab that bottle.
translation.ko: - 페미니스트가 계셨네 - 아이작, 술병 들고 와

translation.en: Yeah, good idea.
So you're helping your guy escape, right? No, baby...
translation.ko: - 친구들 도망치는 거 돕는 거야? - 아니야

translation.en: Hello.
So I was cleaning my car earlier, and guess what I found?
Hm, what did you find? Let me guess, a 100 naira note?
translation.ko: 뭘 찾았을까? 맞혀 볼게요 - 100나이라 지폐? - 1000나이라도 아니고요?

translation.en: Wasn't even a thousand nairas.
Ah, me I wouldn't leave one thousand naira in the car, never!
translation.ko: 내가 차에 1000나이라를 두고 올 리 없어요, 절대

translation.en: But you did forget your earring though.
I didn't realize that they were missing.
I think you left it here on purpose
knowing that I would find it and then call you.
Well, aren't you confident?
Well, it worked.
Oh by the way, my friend Chuks is in love with your friend Kukua.
translation.ko: 참, 내 친구 축스가 당신 친구 쿠쿠아를 사랑해요

translation.en: I know, the way he was looking at her that night, I thought he was going to swallow her.
translation.ko: 알아요, 잡아먹을 것 같은 눈초리로 쳐다보던걸요

translation.en: I think he wants to do that, too.
[chuckles] Kevin, you can pretend like you're innocent, but that's a lie.
translation.ko: 케빈, 순진한 척해도 아닌 거 알아요

translation.en: Please just give up. Don't worry, I'll teach you.
translation.ko: - 포기할래요 - 제발 얼른 포기해요 걱정 마요, 내가 가르쳐줄게요

translation.en: Well, maybe I can come around tomorrow night for some lessons...
translation.ko: 내일 저녁에 들러서 수업 좀 받아야겠네요

translation.en: and to give you back your earring, of course.
Oh, OK.
OK. Well, I'll see you then.
-Good night, Isoken. -Good night, Kevin.
translation.ko: 잘 자요, 이소켄 잘 자요, 케빈

translation.en: OK, so I put the palm oil in, and now, the thing is turning green.
translation.ko: 좋아, 팜 오일 넣었어 이제 녹색으로 변하네

translation.en: No, I bought the regular starch from the store,
isn't that what you said?
Wait, let me see.
[clears throat] OK, wait now, I'm reading it!
Mix starch with cold water. While stirring, pour in hot water...
translation.ko: '전분을 찬물과 섞는다 저으면서 뜨거운 물을 붓고...'

translation.en: Caution: do not use as food?
[laughs] Well, how was I supposed to know
translation.ko: 파랗게 변하는 게 있는지 그러면 안 되는 건지

translation.en: that some of them turn blue and are not supposed to... [chuckles]
translation.ko: 파랗게 변하는 게 있는지 그러면 안 되는 건지 내가 어떻게 알아?

translation.en: Oh my gosh. OK, OK, so what do we do now?
Ah! Oh, jeez, you know what?
No, no, no, it's fine. It's fine. Someone's at my door.
You know what? I'll call you back. I'll call you back. OK, bye.
OK... [groans]
Oh, Kevin.
Oh, right...
You were expecting me, right?
Sorry, I forgot. OK, just come in, come in...
Oh my God, fire!
What are you doing? I'm trying to kill it!
With your hands? Where's your extinguisher?
It's in there. It's in there!
Did you get it?
Yeah! It's done!
-Well, hello there. -Hey!
-Hey. -You've got really good taste in music.
Aw, thank you. I get that from my dad.
You know, I think if he hadn't gotten married and had us kids,
translation.ko: 만약 아빠가 결혼해서 우릴 낳지 않았다면

translation.en: he probably would have played the sax professionally.
translation.ko: 아마 전문 색소폰 연주자가 되셨을 거예요

translation.en: He still talks about the time he used to jam with Fela.
translation.ko: 펠라랑 잼 공연 하셨던 얘기를 아직도 가끔 하세요

translation.en: No way. I love Fela!
translation.ko: - 설마! 펠라 엄청 좋아하는데 - 그래서 내가 유명하죠

translation.en: Dude, that's my claim to fame! I tell everyone that he was my uncle.
translation.ko: - 설마! 펠라 엄청 좋아하는데 - 그래서 내가 유명하죠 사람만 만나면 펠라가 삼촌이라고 떠들거든요

translation.en: No way.
Yeah, uh, after all I'm Nigerian,
and everyone who is a friend of your parents is your uncle.
-Famzer! -[laughs]
Are you sure you're not Nigerian?
You must have bleached your skin or something.
Oh my God, you've got Shina Peters!
Yes, what do you know about Shina Peters, white boy?
translation.ko: - 세상에, 시나 피터스도 있네요! - 네 시나 피터스를 어떻게 알아요 오이보 청년?

translation.en: I'll have you know my nickname used to be oyibo afro juju.
translation.ko: 확실히 말해두는데 내 별명은 '오이보 아프로 주주'였어요

translation.en: Never! Why would they call you that?
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼! 대체 왜 그렇게 부르는데요?

translation.en: The kids of the Nigerians
who worked at the High Commission
translation.ko: 나이지리아인 직원들이 생일 파티를 열곤 했어요

translation.en: -used to have birthday parties. -OK.
translation.ko: 나이지리아인 직원들이 생일 파티를 열곤 했어요 - 그래요? - 생일 파티 때마다

translation.en: Every time, without fail, they used to play Shina Peters
translation.ko: - 그래요? - 생일 파티 때마다 시나 피터스 곡을 틀어놓고

translation.en: and have these dance competitions.
I don't know how, but I just kept winning every time.
-[laughs] -I think they felt sorry for me.
-Oh wow, really? You kept winning? -Yeah.
Oh, I have to see this then. Excuse me.
What? What are you doing?
I want you to dance for me. I want you to show me the moves.
-You want me to dance for you? -Yeah!
Is it every day you see oyibo afro juju?
So please.
Fine, fine. But prepare to be amazed.
translation.ko: - 부탁해요 - 알았어요 깜짝 놀랄 준비나 해요

translation.en: Take it away.
Huh? OK, what is, what is that?
No, no, no. Kevin, you really have to stop!
Oh, you can't stop this. You can't stop these moves, no.
translation.ko: 이건 못 멈춰요 - 이 춤은 못 멈춰요 - 제발요

translation.en: Please, please, please...
And then she said, "Are they sharing children in the university?"
No, she didn't.
Yes, she did. My mother...
So it doesn't matter what a woman accomplishes in her life.
translation.ko: 여자는 어떤 성취를 이루든 쓸데없는 거예요

translation.en: She could find a cure for AIDS,
she could find a cure for world hunger, even cancer,
translation.ko: 세계 기아 해결책을 찾든 암 치료제를 찾든

translation.en: and it still wouldn't matter
unless she was able to bag herself a husband and pop out some babies.
I know what you mean. The pressure here to get married is massive.
translation.ko: 무슨 말인지 알아요 여긴 결혼 압박이 엄청나죠

translation.en: How you're perceived is so important.
I remember, in university, we had a friend,
she got married right out of university and then had a child shortly after.
translation.ko: 졸업 직후 결혼해서 바로 아이를 낳았어요

translation.en: She must've been like, what, 22 years old?
And then while we were out clubbing and having boyfriends
translation.ko: 우린 클럽이나 다니고 남자친구 사귀면서 애처럼 살 때

translation.en: and just being kids, she was at home changing diapers.
translation.ko: 우린 클럽이나 다니고 남자친구 사귀면서 애처럼 살 때 걔는 집에서 기저귀를 갈았죠

translation.en: So I bet she must have felt like a pariah.
translation.ko: 그러니 걔는 아마 버려진 기분이었을 거예요

translation.en: Eventually, more and more friends started pairing off
translation.ko: 결국엔 점점 더 많은 친구가 짝을 찾고

translation.en: and getting married and having their own children and...
before you know it, it just hits you,
at 34, you're the only single woman at your school's reunion.
translation.ko: 눈 깜짝할 사이에 난 34살이 되고 동창 중에 유일한 싱글이 됐죠

translation.en: It's like one minute, you're a star student,
and then the next minute, you feel like you failed at some life exams.
translation.ko: 정신 차리고 보니 인생 시험에서는 실패한 기분인 거예요

translation.en: Wow, oh my goodness! Is that the time? Oh wow.
translation.ko: 어머, 웬일이야 시간이 벌써 이렇게 됐어요? 우와

translation.en: -Sorry... -Yeah...
I didn't mean to keep you up. No, it's OK. It's fine.
translation.ko: - 못 자게 하려던 건 아닌데 - 아뇨, 괜찮아요

translation.en: I thoroughly enjoyed myself.
I did too, actually.
That's good. Well, thank you for the earring
and your terrible dance moves.
You're welcome. Hey, listen, I just wanted to say,
you have nothing to worry about.
You are an incredibly beautiful woman,
and you will find love... in your own time.
translation.ko: 꼭 사랑을 찾을 거예요 때가 되면요

translation.en: -[sentimental music playing] -I hope so. Thanks, Kevin.
You're welcome.
-OK, good night. -Good night.
Are you ready?
[Isoken] This waxing thing, I'm not sure it's worth the pain.
translation.ko: 왁싱 말인데 이렇게 아픈데 꼭 해야 하나?

translation.en: I don't know about you, but it is working for me.
translation.ko: 넌 어떨지 몰라도 난 효과 톡톡히 보고 있어

translation.en: Chuks cannot get enough of me!
-So you like it when he does that? -Like it? Girl, I love it...
translation.ko: - 넌 그럴 때 좋아? - 좋으냐고? 짱 좋아! 밤새 하래도 할걸

translation.en: Oh please, I beg, enough of this gist.
I can't believe I'm the only one here without a man.
translation.ko: 어떻게 넷 중에 나만 남자가 없냐

translation.en: -Like seriously? -Speak for yourself.
Some people even have two.
-What? -Mm-hm.
Yeah, a white boy.
Agnes!
OK, guys, I'm sorry, but...
I don't know how to feel about Nigerian girls that date white guys.
translation.ko: 난 나이지리아 여자가 오이보 남자 만나는 거 좀 그래

translation.en: It just comes off as,
I don't know, like there's an inferiority complex.
I'm sorry.
I feel you. My cousin calls it the post-colonial blues.
translation.ko: 맞아, 내 사촌은 그게 '식민지 독립 후 우울'이라더라

translation.en: I mean, the way we Africans think everything white is better...
translation.ko: 우리 아프리카인들은 오이보가 뭐든 낫다고 생각하잖아

translation.en: That's why we struggle with all these foreign accents.
translation.ko: 그래서 발음도 똑같이 하려고 엄청 애쓰지

translation.en: Exactly!
Please, Joke calm down. What is it?
If you felt that strongly, why did you go to school in England?
translation.ko: 오이보가 그렇게 싫으면 학교는 왜 런던으로 갔대?

translation.en: Please ask her!
Besides, having light skinned, half-caste kids won't be bad at all, you know?
translation.ko: 그리고 밝은색 피부의 튀기 아이 생기는 게 나쁘진 않지

translation.en: You see what I mean? And by the way, it's mixed race.
translation.ko: - 안 그래? - 저거 봐 그리고 혼혈인이라고 해야지 혼혈인

translation.en: -Mixed race. -Whatever.
translation.ko: 그리고 혼혈인이라고 해야지 혼혈인 얘들아, 그만들 해

translation.en: You guys just relax, OK?
I'm not dating him. We're just friends. Besides if I was, you guys are terrible.
translation.ko: 나 그 사람 안 만나 그냥 친구라고 근데 진짜 만나는 거였으면 너희 진짜 꽝이다

translation.en: So, so wait, wait, wait, you're saying you do not like him?
[sighs] I don't know...
You know, if there ever was a checklist of what a great guy would be,
translation.ko: 만약에 좋은 남자 확인하는 체크 리스트가 있다면

translation.en: Saze would tick every box.
-Ah, ah, one person! -Oh.
-Handsome, check. -Great.
Successful, check. Ambitious, check.
-Great kisser, check, check, check, check! -Really?
So wetin you come dey find again, girl?
I know, but Kevin...
-[sighs loudly] -I just feel like I can be myself.
No need to pretend or try to be someone else.
translation.ko: 꾸밀 필요도 없고 포장할 필요도 없지

translation.en: Maybe because there's no pressure to be perfect around him.
translation.ko: 아마 그 사람 앞에서는 - 완벽할 필요가 없어서? - 잠깐만

translation.en: No. Wait, wait, listen. Look at me, girl.
translation.ko: - 완벽할 필요가 없어서? - 잠깐만 나 봐

translation.en: All these butterflies you're feeling for Kevin...
[smacks lips] Will butterflies pay bills?
Answer!
Look, Saze is the real deal.
Saze knows what he wants, you know,
knows where he's going in life, and it aligns with yours, right?
translation.ko: 인생길 방향도 잘 알고 네 방향과도 일치하잖아

translation.en: I guess...
Your marriage should be a union of two great Edo families.
translation.ko: 네 결혼은 훌륭한 두 집안의 결합이라고

translation.en: The wedding outfits will look great.
I can imagine Flavor and Olamide performing at the wedding!
translation.ko: 플레이버와 올라미드의 결혼식 축하 공연을 상상해 봐

translation.en: -Babes, what else do you what? -Agnes!
Weddings are not concerts!
Exactly! And marriages are not business mergers.
translation.ko: 맞아 그리고 결혼은 기업 합병도 아니야

translation.en: But wait, wait, who says you have to decide now?
translation.ko: 잠깐, 근데 그걸 왜 지금 결정해?

translation.en: You can date both of them. Men have done worse.
translation.ko: 둘 다 만나 - 남자들은 더한 짓도 하는데 - 바람피우라고?

translation.en: But isn't it cheating?
No, no, no, no, no!
So long as you're not sleeping with Kevin as well, it's dating.
-Mm. -There's a difference.
Really?
Isoken, I'm sure you know your mum would flip when she hears this.
translation.ko: 이소켄 너희 엄마가 이 말 들으면 기절하시겠다

translation.en: -Oh please, please... -I beg, please,
enjoy your life! Do it for all the girls around the world!
translation.ko: 인생 즐겨 온 세상 여자들을 위해!

translation.en: I see you want to live vicariously through me, right?
translation.ko: 야! 너 지금 나 보고 대리만족하겠다는 거지?

translation.en: Listen, if I had my own way, I would even date five!
Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday...
translation.ko: - 월, 화, 수, 목, 금... - 쿠쿠아!

translation.en: -Kukua! -Girls, they hustle!
translation.ko: - 월, 화, 수, 목, 금... - 쿠쿠아! 바쁘다, 바빠!

translation.en: -Kukua! -Believe me, you should be there!
-Just saying. -Yeah, it's really cool, just to be out.
translation.ko: - 그냥 그렇다고요 - 네, 나오니까 진짜 좋네요

translation.en: Well, if my truck isn't gonna get us into the market,
translation.ko: 내 차 타고 시장 갈 순 없으니까

translation.en: we're gonna have to use one of these.
What? You this white boy! Don't get me lost in Lagos!
translation.ko: - 저거 잡아타죠 - 뭐라고요? 이봐요, 오이보 청년 라고스에서 길 잃을 일 있어요?

translation.en: I've never ridden one of these.
What? You're the one who wanted to go shopping.
How do you even know these places?
Your Nigerian passport should be taken away from you.
[Isoken] Oh my God! ♪ But I know I kinda maybe really do like you ♪
Add more, add more, it's for your daddy.
My dear, pass me a napkin, please.
Sis, are you sure you don't need help?
So I heard you raised three million dollars for your company.
Oh, yeah.
So you see, I'm into oil and gas as well.
translation.ko: 사실... 제가 석유랑 가스 쪽도 하거든요

translation.en: [in Igbo] What did you say?
No, Mummy, he means OYEL.
Is it not so OYEL?
What now? Can't a young man expand his hustle?
translation.ko: 왜 이래? 사업 좀 확장해 보겠다는데

translation.en: It's all right. You can come see me anytime.
Isoken's family is my family.
Speaking of family...
I am assuming that those are your intentions towards my daughter.
translation.ko: 내 딸이랑 가족이 될 의도로 만나는 게 맞겠지?

translation.en: Father...
Are we really going to have the discussion on intentions? Really?
translation.ko: 지금 꼭 그 얘기를 해야 해요? 꼭요?

translation.en: Is it too soon to ask?
Or doesn't the young man have a plan?
Yes, sir, I do.
I was raised by highly ambitious and hardworking parents
translation.ko: 저희 부모님이 워낙 야망이 크고 부지런하신데

translation.en: who taught us to go after whatever we want in life.
translation.ko: 저희한테는 뭐든 하고 싶은 대로 하라고 가르치셨죠

translation.en: And I recognize those same ambitions in Isoken.
That's what I'm most attracted to in her.
So I believe I can build a great future with Isoken behind me.
translation.ko: 그래서 이소켄이 제 뒤에 있다면 훌륭한 미래를 이룰 것 같아요

translation.en: More chicken anyone? There's still a bit here.
translation.ko: 닭고기 더 드실 분? 여기 있어요

translation.en: Oh, nice. They got some new stuff.
translation.ko: 잘됐다, 새 작품 들어왔네요 네, 항상 작품 업데이트를 하죠

translation.en: That reminds me of Oshuti.
-You've got a good eye. -Mm-hm, I know.
-Nice. -Wow. This is just gorgeous.
What does it strike up for you?
Hm. What I'm getting is lover's embrace.
-Quite apt, hm? -Yes.
♪ ...To keep my feet planted On the ground ♪
translation.ko: 저거 봐요 저 얼굴 좀 봐요 소울이 넘치네요

translation.en: ♪ Let me make this clear I do not care for planetary motions ♪
So, um... are you doing anything tomorrow for your birthday?
translation.ko: 근데 내일 당신 생일에 뭐 할 거예요?

translation.en: Absolutely not!
Why not?
I'm turning 35! Thirty-five!
I remember when I was 18, and now, I'm gonna be 35.
So I don't need any more reminders that I'm five away from 40, OK?

I mean, the drama in our family?
We need our own reality TV show. The Kardashians, they have nothing on us.
translation.ko: 우리도 리얼리티 쇼 해야겠다 카다시안 가족도 우리 가족한텐 못 이길걸

translation.en: I second that motion.
Do you remember when I was going into labor
and she wanted to anoint my vajayjay for...
translation.ko: 이모가 내 질 입구에 성수 바르려 했잖아

translation.en: -[together] ...holy delivery! -I remember! Oh my God, so nuts!
translation.ko: 성스러운 출산을 위해서라고! 기억나! 세상에, 진짜 제정신 아니셔

translation.en: [exhales] Auntie Stella...
She's cray cray, man, cray cray!
You have a lot of courage though, you know?
Me?
Yes, you. I mean, you called off your wedding to Saze.
translation.ko: - 내가? - 응, 언니 오사제랑 결혼을 취소했잖아

translation.en: Do you know how many women would kill to marry Saze?
translation.ko: 오사제랑 결혼하고 싶어서 안달 난 여자가 몇인데

translation.en: You know, maybe that's the thing.
Maybe I'm just too much of an idealist.
No, no, you're not.
You know what you want,
and you have the courage not to settle for less.
translation.ko: 그보다 못한 것에 안주하지 않을 용기가 있는 거야

translation.en: Courage?
OK. Where's the courage now
translation.ko: 좋아 케빈한테 사랑한다고 말할 용기는 어디 있는데?

translation.en: for me to tell Kevin that I love him?
translation.ko: 케빈한테 사랑한다고 말할 용기는 어디 있는데?

translation.en: Do you know that there's a send forth for him tonight
translation.ko: 오늘 저녁에 케빈 송별회 있는 거 알아?

translation.en: because he leaves Nigeria tomorrow? -What? -Yup.
Why aren't you going?
No, there's no point.
It's probably not gonna work out, anyway. I mean...
translation.ko: 어차피 우린 안 될 텐데 뭘

translation.en: Besides, Mum would rather kill herself and me
before she ever has a white son-in-law.
No.
Where did getting married to please Mum get me?
translation.ko: 엄마 좋으라고 결혼해서 내가 어떻게 됐는데?

translation.en: I mean,
I love Tega, and I would kill for my children
translation.ko: 난 테가를 사랑하고 우리 아이들도 너무 사랑해

translation.en: but sometimes, I wish...
Like I wish I had just told them that I wasn't ready, you know?
translation.ko: 아직 준비가 안 됐다고 말할 걸 그랬다 싶어

translation.en: Or I just told them that I needed a little bit more time.
translation.ko: 아니면 시간이 좀 더 필요하다고 말할걸

translation.en: I don't know what I'm doing, Isoken.
And between the school runs and taking care of Tega,
there's no more time for me.
I don't know who I am anymore.
Aw, don't say that, baby sis.
translation.ko: 그런 말 하지 마 우리 예쁜 동생

translation.en: I know who you are.
-You're an amazing mother and wife, Reme. -[scoffs]
You're passionate and kind and beautiful...
-Yeah. -...and smart.
-Keep going. -[laughs]
You're only 28, love. You have the whole world ahead of you.
translation.ko: 넌 이제 28살이야 앞으로 살아갈 날이 얼마나 많은데

translation.en: Wait, I just wish I could press the reset button, you know?
But you don't need a reset button, sis.
All you have to do is just take it one day at a time.
translation.ko: 그냥 하루하루를 열심히 살면 되는 거야

translation.en: Yeah. I love you.
I love you too.
[exhales] Speaking of which,
I think I'm ready for that family intervention right now.
translation.ko: 이제 가족들 잔소리를 들을 준비가 된 거 같다

translation.en: -Are you sure? -Yeah.
Cause I could just tell them that you were sleeping when I got here.
translation.ko: 와 보니 자더라고 말해줄 수도 있는데

translation.en: Nah, nah, let's do this. I'm ready for them. What?
OK...
Bring it, man! Let me just...
translation.ko: 다 덤비라 그래 네 힘 좀 빌려주고

translation.en: I'm gonna drive, OK?
-Yeah, wise baby sister. -[laughs]
Wise.
When I say let me pray for you,
you'll be running away. You see?
How can a 35-year-old woman
break up her own engagement?
Auntie Isoken, you didn't do well.
You should've at least allowed me to collect some millions
from that guy before you broke up with him.
What's wrong with you? What?
translation.ko: - 뭔 소릴 하는 거야? - 왜 지금이냐고

translation.en: Sister! Mama Isoken!
You are sitting down there.
Won't you let us go and beg the King of Kings,
translation.ko: 왕 중의 왕이시며 신 중의 신이신 그분께

translation.en: God of Gods so that this child...
Wait... please!
Isoken,
-are you gay? -What?
Yes!
I have been sitting here cracking my head.
translation.ko: 여기 앉아 머리 깨지게 생각해 봤어

translation.en: The last time you had a boyfriend was when you were 28.
translation.ko: 네가 마지막으로 남자친구를 데려온 게 28살 때야

translation.en: Before then, you brought home only two.
Now, by yourself,
you have gone ahead and told your Saze you can't marry him,
a man like that!
It means you don't want to marry anybody else!
translation.ko: 그러니 누구하고도 결혼 안 하겠다는 거잖아!

translation.en: Mum, she's not gay. She likes somebody else.
-Really? -What's wrong with you?
Who?
His name is Kevin. He's English.
What is wrong with this girl? Don't we all speak English?
translation.ko: 얘 왜 이래? 우린 뭐 영어 안 쓰나?

translation.en: Exactly.
-He's white. -What?
-White? -Yes.
I know this girl is going to disgrace me!
translation.ko: 얘가 나 망신 줄 줄 알았어

translation.en: This girl has disgraced me!
I knew it! I knew it!
Isoken, why can you not be normal like your sisters?
translation.ko: 이소켄, 왜 넌 동생들처럼 평범하게 못 사는 거니?

translation.en: Why can you not be normal?
Are you the only one who went to school in England?
translation.ko: 너만 런던으로 유학 간 거 아니잖아

translation.en: Enough, Mummy, enough!
I nearly married Saze,
who would have made me miserable,
just because I wanted to please you.
So that maybe just for once,
for once in my life, I can say I finally did something to make Mummy happy,
translation.ko: 내가 일평생에 한 번쯤은 엄마를 행복하게 해줬구나 생각하려고요

translation.en: to make you proud of me.
But I know now that will never happen...
translation.ko: 하지만 이제 그럴 일은 절대 없다는 거 알아요

translation.en: unless I do exactly what you want me to do,
and that's not gonna happen.
Because you know what?
I'm not normal.
What?
I never was, and I never will be.
So the earlier you start to accept that, Mummy, the better!
translation.ko: 그러니까 엄마가 그걸 빨리 인정할수록 편할 거예요

translation.en: And lest I forget,
I'm gonna tell Kevin that I love him
and that I want to be with him.
So if you ever want to see your grandchildren,
you better get on board.
Isoken, Isoken! It's OK, it's OK.
Reme, I'm going to need a ride.
translation.ko: 부채질 좀 해줘, 부채질 좀... 레메, 차 좀 태워줘

translation.en: Hey, don't worry, don't worry.
I will take you myself.
I'm coming along!
-Mike! -What?
You can sit if you want to.
Aren't you coming?
-Auntie Stella? You too? -Mm-hm.
Wow! Come on, let's go.
Belt up!
What?
What is it?
-[mumbling] -OK, Isoken, move to the back.
My love, my love!
[flatters] Ye-Isoken!
Hi.
Didn't expect to see you here.
I know. Can we go over there and get some privacy, please?
translation.ko: 알아요 저쪽에 가서 조용히 얘기 좀 할 수 있어요?

translation.en: Yeah, sure. Mind your head.
So, how have you been?
I've been good. How have you been?
Yeah, I've been OK.
OK, so, um...
I know it's probably not gonna make much of a difference,
translation.ko: 이런 말 해도 별 소용 없을 거 알아요

translation.en: especially since you're leaving tomorrow and everything, but...
I just wanted to tell you that I love you, Kevin,
translation.ko: 그래도 말하고 싶었어요 케빈 당신을 사랑한다고

translation.en: and I'm sorry that it's taken me so long to tell you this,
translation.ko: 이 말 하는 데 너무 오래 걸려서 미안하지만

translation.en: but I love you, and I choose you. I choose us.
translation.ko: 당신을 사랑해요 당신을 선택하고 우릴 선택할래요

translation.en: [MC] Mr. Groom, please do not swallow the bride!
Distinguished guests, ladies and gentlemen,
translation.ko: 존경하는 하객 여러분 신사 숙녀 여러분

translation.en: please give it up for the couple of the year,
Kukua and Chuks! Make some noise!
Hold on, can I get some grilled fish and plantain instead?
translation.ko: 죄송합니다, 잠시만요 이거 말고 생선구이랑 바나나로 줄래요?

translation.en: But you said you wanted rice.
Reme, I saw them serving fish,
translation.ko: - 쌀밥 달라면서요? - 레메 생선 있는 거 봤어요

translation.en: it looked nice, so I changed my mind like...
[scoffs] You know what?
You can go ahead and get the fish yourself,
and by the way, I'm going back to work!
Stop running!
-Hey. -Hi, can I get you something?
Um, actually... Actually, I have that sorted already.
Hey, hi. Um... Uh...
Yinka, this is my girlfriend, uh, Tina.
-Girlfriend? -Yes.
Yes, girlfriend. Nice to meet you.
This is my colleague, Yinka.
My friend, stop that!
What now, eh?
Can't a man feel up on his wife?
Or you don't want baby number two?
No, please! My body has not even recovered yet.
translation.ko: 제발 좀 아직 몸매도 안 돌아왔어

translation.en: Ain't nobody got time for that!
You're not having it, are you?
-Come here! -OK, I got a little time.
translation.ko: 이리 와 좋아, 약간은 시간 있지

translation.en: -That's my girl. -[laughs]
If you had introduced me to your friend,
this could have been our wedding.
-Uncle, you? Wedding? -Yes.
Please! [chuckles]
Look, I forgive you.
You can make it up to me.
That your friend there, you can introduce her to me, Agnes.
translation.ko: 네 친구 아그네스한테 날 소개해 줘

translation.en: Agnes?
No offence, Uncle Mike, but I think Agnes would eat you for breakfast.
translation.ko: 죄송하지만 아그네스는 외삼촌을 아침 식사로 뚝딱할걸요

translation.en: May I have this dance?
Isoken tells me you're a very good dancer,
translation.ko: 이소켄 말로는 춤을 아주 잘 추신다던데

translation.en: so please take it easy on me.
translation.ko: 이소켄 말로는 춤을 아주 잘 추신다던데 저한테도 기회를 주세요

translation.en: What did he say?
White boy wants to dance with you.
[laughs] Really?
Ye-Isoken, go and dance.
-He wants to dance? -Yes. -Go dance. -What's wrong with you?
-Come on! -Dance.
-[laughs] White boy wants to dance. -["Sekem" playing]
After you.
